amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part C of House Report 115-677 to amend the Nutrition title to allow SNAP users to purchase a multivitamin with their SNAP benefits.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Rogers (AL).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
